channel.title: language on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in language on Barefoot Rob

item.title: language exchange with Akiko
item.description: 23:05 Thursday 11 July 2019 JST Akiko and I went to her train line’s side of Akihabara, and ate at the Indian restaurant on the 9th floor of the BIC Camera building. Bottomless cheese nan seems like a good deal until I eat the second one! We talked about her upcoming trip overseas and pets and other stuff I am too tired to remember, much less write. Oh, we also talked about commas and when to use them.

item.title: language exchange with Akiko
item.description: 00:06 Friday 21 June 2019 JST Today was the second time for Akiko and I to do a language exchange. She had some good ideas for Marble Track 3 and how to market it. I may end up creating another Instagram account; that is apparently the way to go these days. So happy to get another subscriber on Youtube, and enthralling to see her enthralled with the process of animating the construction!

item.title: Chapter in language
item.description: ##10:11 Tuesday 24 March 2015 JST## Finished lesson; ‘twas fine and interesting topic about Paul Allen’s team recently finding Battleship Musashi. Finished the lesson and outside the station I saw two women looking at the local area map. I wasn’t able to help them as quickly as they helped themselves (by finding their target on the map before I did) but I was most depressed that I don’t know French.
